original_text: “If a man borrows anything of his neighbor, and it is injured or dies, the owner not being with it, he shall make full restitution.
korean_text: 만일 이웃에게 빌려온 것이 그 임자가 함께 있지 아니할 때에 상하거나 죽으면 반드시 배상하려니와

sentences.original_text: If a man borrows anything of his neighbor,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 사람이 이웃의 무언가를 빌렸는데,

sentences.original_text: and it is injured or dies,
the owner not being with it,
